name: helloworld-js
description: A demo plugin for Chili3D showing plugin system capabilities

scripts.package: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "if (Test-Path dist) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist }; if (Test-Path .package-temp) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .package-temp }; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path dist | Out-Null; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path .package-temp -Force | Out-Null; Copy-Item manifest.json .package-temp/manifest.json; Copy-Item src/extension.js .package-temp/extension.js; Copy-Item icons .package-temp/icons -Recurse; Compress-Archive -Path .package-temp/* -DestinationPath dist/helloworld-js.zip -Force; Rename-Item -Path dist/helloworld-js.zip -NewName helloworld-js.chiliplugin -Force; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .package-temp"

author: Chili3D Team
